entities.name: library
entities.description: The library is described as pitch black and eerie, with rows of books. The description mentions that Harry lit a lamp to see his way along the rows of books.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the protagonist who is navigating the library. He is described as feeling uneasy and sensing a faint whispering coming from the books.

entities.name: lamp
entities.description: The lamp is mentioned as being lit by Harry to see his way along the rows of books. It is also described as looking like it was floating in mid-air.

entities.name: restricted section
entities.description: The Restricted Section is introduced as being located at the back of the library. Harry steps carefully over a rope to access this area.

entities.name: books
entities.description: The books are described as having peeling and faded gold letters that spell words in languages Harry cannot understand. Some have no title at all, and one has a dark stain that looks like blood.

entities.name: blood
entities.description: A book is mentioned to have a dark stain on it that looks horribly like blood.

relationships.description: Harry entered the library and lit a lamp to see his way along the rows of books.
Harry held up his lamp to read the titles on the books in the Restricted Section.
Harry stepped carefully over a rope to access the Restricted Section at the back of the library.
